body:
### Steps to reproduce

On a fresh Apple M1 MacBook Pro, just installed the command line utilities (like `git`), cloned `spack` and put `spack` into `$PATH`. The bootstrapping fails:

```console
$ spack -d spec zlib
```

### Error message

```
$ spack -d spec zlib
==> [2021-10-11-16:04:11.989835] Imported spec from built-in commands
==> [2021-10-11-16:04:11.990287] Imported spec from built-in commands
Input spec
--------------------------------
zlib
```
